info.description:
What: An invitation to Towel Day and ze reveal of ShaderAmp 1.0
Music, visualizations, drinks and games related to Douglas Adams.

Where: c-base Berlin (c-base.org)

When: 2024-05-25  8:00 pm.

All hoopy froods are welcome. 

Bring your own Towel!
info.name: TowelDay&ShaderAmp@c-base Berlin
